verses.roman:
prathamei kahila prabhura ye-rūpe gamana
ei-mata jāniha yāvat dakṣiṇa-bhramaṇa

synonyms: prathamei—at the beginning; kahila—I have explained; prabhura—of Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ye-rūpe—as; gamana—the touring; ei-mata—in this way; jāniha—you should know; yāvat—as long as; dakṣiṇa-bhramaṇa—touring in South India.
translation: Whatever I have stated about the beginning of the Lord's movement should also be understood to hold for as long as the Lord toured South India.
